name: Rubber Ducky and the Rainbow Gun
description: Rubber Ducky has found a Rainbow Gun during a rainstorm of colored weaponry! The Spikies love to be zapped with Rainbow Guns - so much, in fact, that they'll teleport away to tell the other Spikies about it. Follow Rubber Ducky as he spreads laser-ed goodwill in this shooter-meets-plushie-toy romp!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: 1.4 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM MB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound

reviews.review_text: This game is the pass-time by excellence  There is a story , there is a narrator with a nice voice , there are very pleasant background songs  Every secret to find , secret level , speedrun mod ...  When I bought this game for so little money , I didn't guess it was as complete as it is ...   This game can't become boring   10/10 Would play to the second or another game like this.
nice game but could use a few more hours of gameplay
Rubber Ducky really is the one
Play past the first level, It gets better after that.
i decided to sell a skin(r.i.p glock-18 | candy apple) 4 this game(was on sale for 30 cents) and i cant say that it was entirerly worth it but stll its a fun game
Well, this game is entertaining, funny and has somehow a replay value. Dev is also a great guy. What more could you possibly expect from a $1 indie game?
Nice little game that keeps you entertained in short blasts!          YouTubeâ„¢ Video:  RUBBER DUCKY AND THE RAINBOW GUN
